original_text: Then he went away from them about as far as you can throw a stone. He went down on his knees and he prayed,
korean_text: 그들을 떠나 돌 던질 만큼 가서 무릎을 꿇고 기도하여

sentences.original_text: Then he went away from them
about as far as you can throw a stone
sentences.korean_translation: 돌을 던질 수 있는 거리만큼 떨어져서

sentences.original_text: He went down on his knees
